# Hasty Haversack
## Overview
**Aura** moderate conjuration; **CL** 9th

**Slot** â€”

**Price** 12,000 gp

**Weight** 5 lbs.

**Description**

Rather than merely place desired items on top of its compartments, this [[Handy Haversack|haversack]] literally tosses desired items into your hands as you begin to reach for them. You may remove an item from the *hasty haversack* as a swift action.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Haste (Spell)|haste]], [[Secret Chest (Spell)|secret chest]]*

**Cost** 6,000 gp

**Source:** 5 Handy Haversacks (Super Genius Games), pg. 2
